comments.body: Should the 1 be moved to the right of `:`, inside the other pair of quotes? Both here and below

@mihaimaruseac In 2.0.0 version of libjpeg-turbo the cmakedefine is:
```
#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS
```

So in the past the replacement bazel rule is would be the following to undef:
```
"#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS": "",
```

And the following for define:
```
"#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS": "#define NEED_BSD_STRINGS 1",
```

However, in 2.0.4 libjpeg-turbo changed the way the template was setup. It is now:
```
#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS 1
```

So in order to undef I use the following:
```
"#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS 1": "",
```

And I use the following for define (note the extra `1` is actually not touched:
```
"#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS": "#define NEED_BSD_STRINGS",
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +525,529 @@    "#cmakedefine HAVE_STDLIB_H 1": "#define HAVE_STDLIB_H 1",
    "#cmakedefine NEED_SYS_TYPES_H 1": "#define NEED_SYS_TYPES_H 1",
    "#cmakedefine NEED_BSD_STRINGS 1": "",
    "#cmakedefine HAVE_UNSIGNED_CHAR 1": "#define HAVE_UNSIGNED_CHAR 1",
    "#cmakedefine HAVE_UNSIGNED_SHORT 1": "#define HAVE_UNSIGNED_SHORT 1",
